name: { Riding on Rails }
tagline: Riding with Rails : Blog about Ruby on Rails Tutorials & Code Snippets
body:
![pdahal](https://scontent-a-dfw.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-frc1/1003034_10153141287095604_1031109347_n.jpg)
# Hi I'm Puru Dahal
### This is my personal blog about Ruby on Rails and my experience so far "Riding on Rails". I will be sharing what I know and asking what I do not know. If I come along any problems, my first stop is [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/2963837/pdahal), any solution I get from there and only if that solution works for me, I will sharing with ya'll.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
